WebRTC Introduction

What is WebRTC ? WebRTC is an Industry and standards effort to put real-time communciations cappabilites into all browser and make these capabilities APIs (Johnston - API WebRTC). Real Time Communication on WebRTC enables peer to peer video, audio, data communication between web browsers. This al...
